trans-unit.source: Specifies the values that define a Peer <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定定義對等 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 物件的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> is a set of nodes that can communicate with each other through the network.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>是一組可以透過網路彼此通訊的節點。

trans-unit.source: Cloud, peer mesh, and peer-to-peer graph are synonymous.
trans-unit.target: 雲端、 對等網狀結構和對等圖形的意義相同。

trans-unit.source: A single peer or node may be connected to more than one cloud.
trans-unit.target: 單一對等或節點可能已連線至多個雲端。

trans-unit.source: Communication between nodes should never cross from one cloud to another.
trans-unit.target: 節點之間的通訊絕對不應該跨越不同的雲端。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> instance is uniquely identified by its name, which is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> 執行個體可透過其區分大小寫的名稱唯一進行識別。

trans-unit.source: Clouds are tied very closely to network interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 雲端極為緊密地繫結至網路介面。

trans-unit.source: On a multi-homed machine with two network cards attached to different subnets, three clouds will be returned: one for each of the link local addresses per interface, and a single global scope cloud.
trans-unit.target: 在有兩張網路卡連結至不同子網路的多重主目錄電腦上，將會傳回三個雲端：一個介面的一個連結本機位址有一個，以及單一全域範圍雲端。

trans-unit.source: Reference to the object that holds the data needed to deserialize this instance.
trans-unit.target: 參考保有還原序列化此執行個體所需資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: Context that provides the means for deserializing the data.
trans-unit.target: 提供還原序列化資料方法的內容。

trans-unit.source: Also referred to as the source of the serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 也稱為序列化資料的來源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the PNRP <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 PNRP <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 型別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This populates a serialization information object with the data needed to serialize the Cloud object.
trans-unit.target: 這會以序列化 Cloud 物件所需的資料，填入序列化資訊物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A> property contains the name of the cloud object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>屬性包含雲端物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> which represents all the link-local clouds in which the client or peer is currently participating.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 的參考，代表用戶端或對等目前參與的所有連結本機 Cloud。

trans-unit.source: Use of this property causes a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration> or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> to occur in all possible link local clouds.
trans-unit.target: 使用此屬性會導致<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>或<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>會出現在所有可能的連結本機雲端。

trans-unit.source: Returns a static reference to a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> which represents all the available clouds in which the client is currently participating.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 的靜態參考，代表用戶端目前參與的所有可用 Cloud。

trans-unit.source: This field is used to automatically call <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration> or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> to on all possible clouds.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位用來自動呼叫<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>或<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>到所有可能的雲端上。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the content of this <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> object is equivalent to the content of another object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷這個 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 物件的內容是否等於另一個物件的內容。

trans-unit.source: The cloud to compare with this <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />.
trans-unit.target: 要與這個 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 比較的 Cloud。

trans-unit.source: Performs a case-sensitive comparison between two cloud objects.
trans-unit.target: 在兩個 Cloud 物件之間執行區分大小寫的比較。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> specified identifies the same resource as the current one, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 識別的資源和目前的資源相同時，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: No normalizations are performed on the strings prior to comparison.
trans-unit.target: 在比較之前字串上執行不正規化。

trans-unit.source: All normalization should have been completed at the time the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> objects were constructed.
trans-unit.target: 所有的正規化應該已完成時<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>建構物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with this <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />.
trans-unit.target: 要和這個 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 比較的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the content of this peer <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> is equivalent to the content of a <see cref="N:System" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷這個對等 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 的內容是否等於 <see cref="N:System" /> 物件的內容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> and the comparison object contain the same information; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> 和比較物件包含相同的資訊，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method inherits the default signature and behavior from <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法繼承的預設簽章和行為<xref:System.Object>。

trans-unit.source: Other objects that may be compared with <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer> clouds include PeopleNearMe clouds and peer meshes available via the Windows SDK Networking Services.
trans-unit.target: 可能相較於其他物件<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer>雲端包含 PeopleNearMe 雲端和對等網狀結構可透過 Windows SDK 網路服務。

trans-unit.source: Obtains a collection of peer clouds known to the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得呼叫的對等已知的對等 Cloud 集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.CloudCollection" /> object that specifies a collection of peer clouds known to the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.CloudCollection" /> 物件，指定呼叫的對等已知的對等 Cloud 集合。

trans-unit.source: If no clouds are available, <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有可用的 Cloud，則傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method and the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.GetCloudByName%2A> methods are the only ways to get new instances of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法和<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.GetCloudByName%2A>方法所取得的新執行個體的唯一方式<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>類別。

trans-unit.source: Clouds are tied very closely to network interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 雲端極為緊密地繫結至網路介面。

trans-unit.source: On a multi-homed machine with two network cards attached to different subnets, three clouds will be returned: one for each of the link local addresses per interface, and a single <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Global%2A> scope <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>.
trans-unit.target: 多重主目錄電腦上有兩張網路卡附加到不同子網路將會傳回三個雲端： 一個用於每個連結本機位址，每個介面和單一<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Global%2A>範圍<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>。

trans-unit.source: Contains the name of the PNRP <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />.
trans-unit.target: 內含 PNRP <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> object with the specified cloud name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有指定之 Cloud 名稱的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> object with the specified cloud name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定之 Cloud 名稱的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size of the name is 256 characters.
trans-unit.target: 名稱的大小上限是 256 個字元。

trans-unit.source: If the `cloudName` parameter is `null` or empty, then `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`cloudName`參數是`null`或是空的然後`null`傳回。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the cloud, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Global%2A>, link-local, or otherwise, is specified in <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 雲端的範圍<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Global%2A>、 連結本機或其他方式，指定在<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> name is not known.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 名稱不明。

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="M:System.Object.GetHashCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Object.GetHashCode" />。

trans-unit.source: A hashcode for the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Two objects are considered equal if this method returns the same hashcode for both of them.
trans-unit.target: 兩個物件視為相等，如果此方法傳回兩者都是相同的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Holds the serialized data associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 保留與 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 物件相關聯的序列化資料。

trans-unit.source: Contains the destination for the serialized stream associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 包含與 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 物件相關聯之序列化資料流的目的地。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="N:System.Runtime.Serialization" /> information object with the data needed to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />.
trans-unit.target: 以序列化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 所需的資料，填入 <see cref="N:System.Runtime.Serialization" /> 資訊物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> instance that contains globally (internet) scoped peers.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 執行個體，內含全域 (網際網路) 範圍對等。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> which contains the peers that will communicate via the global network scope.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />，內含的對等會透過全域網路範圍進行通訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the peer <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得對等 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the peer <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />.
trans-unit.target: 對等 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Names are case sensitive and are Unicode encoded.
trans-unit.target: 名稱會區分大小寫，而且都是以 Unicode 編碼。

trans-unit.source: They are under 128 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: 它們是長度超過 128 個字元。

trans-unit.source: Gets the network scope of the peer <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得對等 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 的網路範圍。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpScope" /> enumeration value that specifies the PNRP scope of the current peer cloud instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpScope" /> 列舉值，指定目前對等 Cloud 執行個體的 PNRP 範圍。

trans-unit.source: Clouds are tied very closely to network interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 雲端極為緊密地繫結至網路介面。

trans-unit.source: On a multi-homed machine with two network cards attached to different subnets, three network scopes are possible: one for each of the link local addresses per interface, and a single <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Global%2A> scope <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>.
trans-unit.target: 多重主目錄電腦上有兩張網路卡附加到不同子網路可能有三種網路範圍是： 一個用於每個連結本機位址，每個介面和單一<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Global%2A>範圍<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of a specific IP address for this peer <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個對等 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 的特定 IP 位址識別項。

trans-unit.source: An integer value that specifies the scope-specific ID for this peer cloud.
trans-unit.target: 整數值，指定這個對等 Cloud 的範圍特定 ID。

trans-unit.source: On a multi-homed machine with two network cards attached to different subnets, two network scopes are possible: one is a link local <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and the other is <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Global%2A> scope.
trans-unit.target: 多重主目錄電腦上有兩張網路卡附加到不同子網路可能的兩個網路範圍是： 其中一個是連結本機<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>，而另一個<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Global%2A>範圍。

trans-unit.source: Holds the serialized data associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 保留與 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 物件相關聯的序列化資料。

trans-unit.source: Contains the destination for the serialized stream associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 包含與 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 物件相關聯之序列化資料流的目的地。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable" /> interface and returns the data needed to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable" /> 介面，並傳回序列化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 執行個體所需的資料。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表目前的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />。

trans-unit.source: This method inherits the default signature and behavior from <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法繼承的預設簽章和行為<xref:System.Object>。
